text: if you use dating apps or you're
considering creating a profile on Tinder
keep watching because today we'll go
over four common problems with dating
apps that you need to be aware of
problem number one dating apps are
designed to keep the users hooked social
media apps are designed to be addictive
and dating apps are no exception since
it's very hard for the average man to
get a lot of matches dating apps
incentivize their users to spend money
in order to boost their chances of
getting a match by spending money you
can increase your profile visibility get
more swipes or use some other gimmick
that can help you get matches it
essentially turns the app into a Pay to
Win business model after getting some
success with the premium version and
getting hits of dopamine as a results it
can be very hard to go back to the basic
version where you get very little or no
engagement at all you're basically
encouraged to keep paying for the
premium subscription to keep the
dopamine coming but why are these
platforms so addictive well it boils
down to a psychological concept known as
intermittent reinforcement intermittent
reinforcement suggests that when rewards
are handed out unpredictably rather than
consistently we're more likely to repeat
the behavior in Hope of that next win
with dating apps matches are this seeked
after reward creating a cycle of
anticipation and activity that keeps you
coming back for more this is a similar
mechanism to what's found in gambling
where gamblers only win some of the time
this is why gambling is so highly
addictive social media apps use
intermittent reinforcement to keep the
users hooked and keep going back to the
app the hope of finding an ideal partner
is a strong motivation in and of itself
but it gets even more powerful when used
with intermittent reinforcement problem
number two overemphasis on physical
appearance one of the uncomfortable
truths of dating is the fact that
physical appearance plays a huge role
when it comes to choosing a partner this
is especially the case when it comes to
dating apps your personality is just as
important as your physical looks but you
can't really assess one's personality by
simply looking at their dating profile
women don't care about looks as much as
men do but all things being equal they
will still prefer physically attractive
partners for example height is viewed as
an attractive trait in men by women
across some cultures and age groups this
is not to say that physical
attractiveness is the only or even the
most important factor when it comes to
dating success attraction is deep and
complex and people are attracted to each
other for various different reasons but
when it comes to dating ABS that may not
be the case one of the reasons why
Attractive people tend to do better on
dating ABS has to do with the halo
effect the halo effect means that people
ascribe positive character traits to a
person based on a single trait like good
looks for example we may view Attractive
people as more kind confidence
intelligence competence and so on even
though these qualities may have nothing
to do with the way they look the problem
with the halo effect is the fact that it
becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy if
people ascribe certain positive
qualities to you you're likely to live
up to these qualities before we delve
into the next challenge you face by
using dating apps let's talk about a
great method to enhance your profile and
Captivate your future date and that's to
master a new language which leads us to
today's sponsor mandley introduced in
2014 mandley has rapidly emerged as the
preferred app for language learning
distinguished by Innovative features
including real-time conversations with a
chatbot this unique function offers Cru
cral pronunciation feedback setting it
apart from other applications mly
emphasizes practicality offering lessons
and conversational language skills vital
for real world situations such as
preparing for an upcoming Journey or
even ordering food the daily lessons
included are delivered by native
speakers ensuring your pronunciation is
accurate for those looking to maximize
their time the handsfree mode is perfect
for multitasking activities like cooking
or walking while learning a new language
for a significant discount on a lifetime
membership to monley visit mon. apppp
simproved pill and enjoy Savings of up
to
96% now on to the next problem with
dating apps and that is that there is a
gender imbalance on dating apps the main
reason why men have trouble getting
matches has to do with simple
mathematics there are a lot more men
using dating apps than women meaning
it's harder for the average man to get a
match for example there's 75% male users
and only 25% female users on Tinder
other dating apps also have
disproportionately more men than women
and this imbalance influences the way
people use the apps since it's harder
for men to get matches male users tend
to like more profiles to boost their
chances of getting a match women tend to
do the exact opposite women tend to get
more matches and often get flooded by
messages from a number of different men
this means they tend to be more
selective and simply ignore most of the
messages and since physical
attractiveness also plays a significant
role men who are simply average looking
don't stand much of a chance and finally
problem number four too many choices
dating apps allow you to pick and choose
from a wide variety of potential
Partners but this abundance of choices
may do more harm than good the problem
with having too many choices is the fact
that you can never be sure that you made
the right one let's say you go to the
ice cream shop and there are three
flavors to choose from you wouldn't have
to think twice about which flavor to
choose and you'd probably be content
with your choice but suppose you walked
into an ice cream shop and there are
dozens of different flavors with a bunch
of different toppings you want to get
the best ice cream but how can you be
sure you're going to be choosing the
best one the more choices you have the
less likely you're going to be content
with what you chose when using dating
apps people often have a fear of missing
out with a number of potential Partners
out there it could be hard to settle for
one person so people think there's
always someone better out there if all
this makes you feel like the dating apps
are a rigged game well that's because
they are this video is not about dispar
in dating apps or people who use them
dating apps can certainly be useful but
if you decide to use them it's important
to manage your expectations don't take
it personally if you aren't getting any
matches because the odds aren't in your
favor in the first place you can still
use the dating apps but don't rely on
them exclusively if you want to improve
your dating life you're much better off
meeting people the oldfashioned way go
out in the real world join clubs or
groups that share your interests go out
and hang out with your friends strike up
conversations with strangers get out of
your comfort zone if you're having
trouble with starting conversations
watch this video next besides that guys
stay
tuned
